TTSC.SAPI5Settingshint: Configuration for using SAPI5 text-to-speech engine with Boyomi-chan
TTSC.BymChnDefaultVolumehint: Default value for individual vocalizer setting (min 0, max 300)
TTSC.BymChnWhisperSetting: Have the Boyomi-chan read out all whisper chat message
TTSC.BymChnWhisperSettingHint: If enabled, the Boyomi-chan will read out the chat message even if it is not visible to you
TTSC.BymChnPolyglotSetting: Have the Boyomi-chan read out the chat message with the language set
TTSC.BymChnPolyglotSettingHint: If enabled, reads out the chat message with the language settings of the Polyglot Module function
TTSC.BymChnPlayerSetting: Show vocalizer settings' button to players
TTSC.BymChnPlayerSettinghint: Show individual vocalizer settings' button to your players (auto-reload)
TTSC.NijiVoiceLinkageFunctionHint: A separate desktop application, “NijiVoice to Foundry” must be downloaded and launched
TTSC.NijiVoiceLinkageAPI: API server address for “NijiVoice to Foundry” application
TTSC.NijiVoiceLinkageAPIHint: The default address in the app settings is “http://localhost:2000”
TTSC.NijiVoiceLimit: Notification of the number of credits remaining in Niji Voice
TTSC.NijiVoiceLimitHint: If the remaining credit after voice generation is less than this value, a notification will be sent to you to let you know
TTSC.NijiVoiceActorAddToList: Add all voice actors of Niji Voice to the list of ID settings for this world
TTSC.NijiVoiceActorAddToListHint: Note that the list will be updated and added when you save your settings, as more than 100 people will be added
TTSC.NijiVoiceActorJournalCreate: Create a journal for Niji Voice
TTSC.NijiVoiceActorJournalCreateHint: Create a journal of the latest list of voice actors in NijiVoice when saving this settings
TTSC.ButtonTTSSpeakerSettings: Individual readout settings for each vocalizer
TTSC.WindowSAPI5Settingstitle: Configuration of SAPI5 sound source to be used
TTSC.WindowID: ID in Boyomi-chan's text-to-speech engine (10001 or higher)
TTSC.WindowCheckDeletecontent: Are you sure you want to delete the file? (The deletion is immediate and cannot be restored.)
TTSC.WindowCheckResetcontent: Are you sure you want to reset SAPI5 voice ID settings to default values? (Other settings will not be changed. This action cannot be undone.)
TTSC.WindowNoNameNoIdcontent: There is an item with a blank name or ID. Are you sure you want to delete the item?
TTSC.WindowSelectSpeakerVoicetitle: Individual readout settings for each vocalizer
TTSC.WindowNijiVoiceSettingsTitle: Setting up the sound source of the Niji Voice Actor to be used
TTSC.WindowNijiVoiceDeleteTitle: Deletion of Niji Voice Sound Source
TTSC.WindowNijiVoiceIDTitle: Only one-byte alphanumeric characters and one-byte hyphens can be entered
TTSC.NotifyNijiVoiceLimit: The remaining credits for Niji Voice are {cr} characters! Please consider purchasing additional credits, etc!
TTSC.NotifyNijiVoiceSettingsReset: NijiVoice settings have been reset to default values
TTSC.BulkConfirmContent: Apply bulk settings to the selected {count} speakers?
TTSC.ActorSubdivisionSettingHint: When enabled, actor speakers will be grouped by their type (e.g., Character, NPC) in the voice selection dialog
TTSC.BulkConfirmVoiceContent: Apply voice settings to the selected {count} speakers?
TTSC.BulkConfirmVolumeContent: Apply volume settings to the selected {count} speakers?
TTSC.SAPI5EmptyMessage: No SAPI5 voice settings found. Click the 'Add' button to add a new voice.
TTSC.WindowImportConfirmContent: Current settings will be deleted and replaced with imported file contents. Are you sure?
TTSC.WindowImportSuccess: SAPI5 voice settings imported successfully ({count} items)
TTSC.WindowImportInvalidFormat: Invalid file format. Please select a valid SAPI5 voice settings file.
TTSC.WindowImportNoValidData: No valid data found. Existing settings will be preserved.
TTSC.WindowNijiVoiceImportInvalidFormat: Invalid file format. Please select a valid NijiVoice settings file.
TTSC.BracketReadingModeHint: Filtering settings for reading text inside/outside Japanese brackets (「」). Note: Double quotes ("") are not supported. Only Japanese brackets (「」) are recognized.
TTSC.BracketMode3: 3. Read outside brackets with User/GM voice (Actors only)
TTSC.BracketDebugModeHint: When enabled, detailed bracket filtering information will be logged to the console (for developers)
TTSC.MutedChatTabsMenuHint: Configure which Multiple Chat Tabs should not trigger text-to-speech
TTSC.MutedChatTabsDescription: Check the tabs you want to mute:
TTSC.MutedChatTabsModuleNotActive: Multiple Chat Tabs module is not active.
